features: ON-THE-GO ENTERTAINMENT: Make travels with your little one a joy with Itzy Ritzy's Activity Toy. Perfect for infants aged 0 months and up, it ensures a delightful experience during car rides and strolls, keeping your baby happily engaged.

SENSORY ADVENTURES: Engage your baby's senses with the soft moon toy, with a dangling mirror that reflects light. The quilted rainbow toy adds visual delight with two hexagon clinking rings, encouraging reaching & grasping for motor skill development.

CALM & EXPLORATORY: Experience soothing travels as the cloud toy emits gentle jingle sounds, creating a calm atmosphere. The textured grosgrain ribbons provide sensory exploration, ensuring your baby's hands stay occupied during on-the-go adventures.

SECURE & SIMPLE SETUP: Effortlessly attach the soft, flexible spiral to car seats or strollers, securing it with added loops. Prioritizing safety and convenience, Itzy Ritzy ensures a fuss-free, secure attachment for worry-free play.

THOUGHTFUL GIFTING: Looking for a thoughtful gift? Consider Itzy Ritzy's Spiral Car Seat & Stroller Activity Toy—a delightful present that adds a touch of joy to any journey. Practicality with a playful spirit, it's perfect for on-the-go families.
body.description: Travels abound! Endless adventures await with your babe’s new travel tagalong, the Itzy Bitzy Spiral from our Bitzy Bespoke collection! Watch as your babe reaches for the dangling ring, smiles at their reflection in the hanging mirror, and grasps for the ribbons keeping their little hands busy. Our natural cotton fabrics are gentle & soft to baby’s touch. For the many travels ahead, easily attach the Itzy Bitzy Spiral to car seats and strollers for fun on the go! Whether it's a quick stroll or a long car ride, this travel tagalong promises endless entertainment for your little explorer. Immerse your baby in a world of sensory delight. The carefully curated design of the Itzy Bitzy Spiral encourages tactile exploration, visual engagement, and auditory stimulation, fostering crucial developmental milestones. The combination of the soft, textured fabrics and interactive elements makes this tagalong not just a source of entertainment but a valuable tool for your baby's growth and discovery. Elevate every journey with the perfect blend of fun and learning!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A flexible spiral design easily and securely attaches to car seat handles or stroller bars for on-the-go fun! About Our Brand At Itzy Ritzy, we're not just a brand; we're parents too. Founded by Kelly and Brian while navigating the adventure of raising three little ones, we get the highs, lows, and everything in between. From day one, our commitment has been to real parents like you, offering chic, quality products. Embrace the Itzy Ritzy experience—a journey of love, support, and unmatched style for every parent. Itzy Ritzy Spiral Car Seat Activity Toy A spiral activity toy with soft natural cotton fabric in a beautiful color palette! Endless adventures await with your babe’s new travel tagalong, the Itzy Bitzy Spiral Car Seat Activity Toy from our Bitzy Bespoke collection! Watch as your little one reaches for the dangling rings, smiles at their reflection in the hanging mirror, and grasps for the ribbons and plush toy. These interactive hanging toys will keep their little hands busy during car rides, walks and other adventures! The spiral activity toy easily attaches to a car seat or stroller and stays put with added velcro attachment loops! Dangling rings and a plush toy entertain baby with movement, textures and sound. A toy with a hanging mirror reflects light and captures baby’s interest. Designed for ages 0 months and up

Toy with Mirror Embedded with a charming hanging mirror, our spiral becomes a source of fascination for your baby. As they gaze into the mirror, the reflective surface not only captures their attention but also introduces them to the joy of self-discovery. Watch as their faces light up with smiles as they interact with their own adorable reflection! Dangling Rings Encourage your baby's grasping and reaching skills with the delightful dangling rings incorporated into our spiral design. These vibrant rings not only add a playful visual element but also provide a tactile experience, promoting the development of fine motor skills as your baby explores the fascinating world within their reach. Sensory-Rich Plush Toy The plush toy on our spiral car seat toy is a multi-sensory wonder! The gentle jingle sound emanating from the toy adds a delightful auditory dimension to playtime. Additionally, the textured grosgrain ribbons serve as a tactile treat for little fingers, keeping them engaged and fostering sensory exploration.

Make playtime a blast for your baby with our Spiral Car Seat Activity Toy! Not only is it super fun, but it also packs in a bunch of benefits. The hanging mirror helps your little one recognize themselves and keeps them visually engaged, giving their brain a good workout. Those dangling rings? They're like a workout for tiny fingers, helping improve their grip and coordination. Plus, our plush toy is a sensory wonderland with textured ribbons and a soft jingle sound, making playtime extra exciting. Perfect for car rides, this toy turns journeys into joyful adventures, keeping your baby entertained and hitting those developmental milestones along the way. Give your baby the gift of discovery and play with our Spiral Car Seat Activity Toy!

Spiral Car Seat & Stroller Activity Toy Musical Pull-Down Toy Linking Ring Set of 8 Braided Rings Link & Love Toy for Stroller, Car Seat or Activity Gym Bespoke Jingle Travel Toy for Stroller, Car Seat or Activity Gym Infant Toy & Teether Features Crinkle Sound & Silicone Teether Age 0 months + 0 months + 0 months + 0 months + 0 months + 0 months + Material ‎Natural cotton ‎Natural cotton Durable plastic Polyester, Sherpa Natural cotton fabric, polyester fibers Non-toxic food grade silicone; polyester Dimensions 9" L x 4.5" W x 10" H 5" L x 2.5" W x 10" H 2.75" L x 0.2" W x 2.75" H 6” L x 2.75" W x 8.75” H 5" L x 1.5" W x 11.5" H 5.5" L x 0.25" W x 5.75" H Features Dangling rings, a plush toy and a mirror will capture baby's interest. Made of soft natural cotton. Plays a soothing melody that lasts for 60 seconds. Dangling ring and ribbons encourage reaching and grabbing. Keep toys nearby and encourage reaching and grasping with these colorful rings. Subtle braided texture helps soothe sore gums. Dangling legs and clinking rings keep baby entertained while a silicone teether helps soothe sore gums. Gentle jingle sound keeps baby entertained and dangling rings encourage reaching and grasping. Crinkle sound and textured ribbons keep baby's hands busy. Gentle silicone teether helps soothe sore gums. Attaches to Car Seat or Stroller ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son plays with this all day long whenever he is in his high chair or in his car seat. It's so easy to velcro on and off. The colors are great and the quality is 100%!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and entertaining
reviews.reviewText: My baby actually enjoys car rides because of this thing. It’s very aesthetic unlike a lot of other ones, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cute and stays in place! Easy to wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even nicer than the pictures
reviews.reviewText: The pictures look nice but the colors and materials use looks nicer in person.Looks high end, good quality, is not flimsy or cheap looking, no idea if it's a China product but it very much looks like is something made elsewhere. I'm very glad I got it and at the price I got it, it looks more expensive.Be careful when unpacking, the material looks to be linen, don't pull the cardboard attach to it, grab a scissor and gently snip it off, otherwise your at risk of damaging the fabric, if it were plastic (synthetic) it wouldn't be a problem but thank God it isn't, so be careful when unpacking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not perfect..
reviews.reviewText: My 3month old really likes this toy. It’s really nice to have the mirror (cow), tags(barn), and rattle (rainbow) on one toy. It just doesn’t stay spread out when you put it on things like a car seat. I might have to find another way to fasten it so the ends don’t just slip to the middle. The other thing I wish is that the design was on both sides of each hanging toy. It’s annoying that they often hang so that my baby just sees the back. Otherwise very cute and nice theme.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and effective
reviews.reviewText: Liked how this was a little more muted color tones. My baby enjoys looking and it and loves when we take a turn in the car and it all moves. Pretty easy to reach around to jiggle it if she’s getting fussy. Comes off and goes on easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As a sad beige mom, I love how muted these colors are. Itzy Ritzy products are always great quality and are super cute! My only complaint is that the toy tends to slide down one side of the car seat handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Aunque es pequeño, tiene diferentes accesorios que lo vuelven muy llamativo, los colores pastel le encantan a mi bebé, no lo saturan. Ya no usa nada donde colgarlo y aún le encanta traerlo en el coche, siempre lo entretiene.
Helps to use as a distraction in the car. Easy to add/remove. One crinkles, one has a bell, and the other a flexible mirror.
This is seriously the cutest toy ever! Worth the money because of cuteness and also aesthetically pleasing. 10/10
Me encanta la calidad de esta marca.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful product, should lose the mirror
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice, cute, well made product that is great for distracting a baby that doesn’t like the car or stroller. The only thing I would want to change is to remove the mirror. It can be hard to control the direction of sunlight when driving or walking with a stroller, and sometimes this flashes in the baby’s eyes. I don’t know why you would put a mirror on a baby toy that is made for outside the house.
